settings.subheading: Promotions, new products and sales, directly to your inbox.

settings.home-features-title: Amazing relief from the daily pain that I had been feeling.
settings.home-features-content: I'm just writing to let you know that I received your product yesterday and immediately started using it. It took me about 3 minutes before I found a good spot on my upper back. The pain went away within seconds. I have been suffering from daily muscle spasms and tightening that was so painful...This would happen daily...This has gone on for over 4 years. MRI's, Xrays, chiropractor, massage therapy, orthopedist.. Anyway, you get the point... I have tried everything and still ..pain. I know that your product isn't fixing the issue, but it has (so far) given me amazing relief from the daily pain that I had been feeling." - Michael Labbe

settings.home-features-title: The Kailo patch works in minutes!
settings.home-features-content: “I got my Kailo patches a week ago. I am amazed at how quickly the control my pain. I have fibromyalgia and when I overdo my back aches so bad I can’t sleep. The Kailo patch works in minutes!” - Rita Valenta

settings.home-features-title: I put it on my forehead and my migraine did not happen!
settings.home-features-content: “I have one. I felt a migraine coming on. I put it on my forehead and my migraine did not happen!!!! My doctor will not prescribe triptans because I had a subarachnoid hemorrhage. I also put this under my neck and no neck pain!!! I tried to put on my neck but it does not bend that well. It really works!! I use medical tape to keep it in place. I have had it two weeks.” - Pogo Charles

settings.banner-heading:
The Microtechnology Patch
That's designed to "Turn Off" Pain In Seconds

settings.video-heading: Kailo’s patented technology uses nanocapacitors to “turn off” your pain like a light switch – that may provide natural relief, anywhere on your body, in seconds.
settings.video-subtext:
Patients have reported that they have not experienced any side effects from Kailo and it can be worn every single day. Patients say that pain relief has never 
been this simple, effective, or affordable.

settings.testimonial-heading: It’s given me amazing relief from the daily pain that I’ve been feeling
settings.testimonial: I received your product yesterday and immediately started using it. It took me about 3 minutes before I found a good spot on my upper back. The pain went away within seconds. I have been suffering from daily muscle spasms and tightening that was so painful. This would happen daily when I walked for more than a couple of minutes and when I would lie down to sleep. This has gone on for over 4 years . MRI’s , Xrays, chiropractor, massage therapy, orthopedist. I have tried everything and still ..pain. I know that your product isn’t fixing the issue, but it has (so far) given me amazing relief from the daily pain that I’ve been feeling. I have told several people about this product and I have no doubt that they will be ordering from you. Thank you so much for developing this amazing technology and delivering it at a reasonable price!!

“My 7-year old daughter woke up this morning with a 103° fever and in agony — 'my brain hurts sooo baaaad' — we laid her down on a pillow with a Kailo patch under her temple. She calmed right down. When we asked her if it still hurt she said yes (but she was no longer crying). So we took it out from under her head. Within 15 seconds she was crying again so we put the Kailo back. After 10 minutes we found it on the bed and she said she took it off because it doesn’t hurt anymore. She’s now sitting up and watching TV.”

settings.testimonial-heading: “I never had a single sore muscle.”
settings.testimonial: “I’m 42 years old and in fair shape. I decided to hike an 11,000+ foot peak with my 17-year old son who is in excellent shape and runs cross country competitively. My son slowed his pace so that we could hike together and we made the round trip in 8 hours. During the entire hike, I wore a Kailo patch in each of my back pockets. For the next three days my son complained of sore leg muscles and had trouble climbing stairs. I never had a single sore muscle. I attribute it to wearing the Kailo patches.”

settings.faq-question: Is Kailo a Pain Patch?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo is an innovative, non-transdermal technology that looks and acts like a pain patch. Kailo can be placed directly on the skin, or over lightweight clothing or placement accessories. Kailo does not have to touch the skin to be effective.

settings.faq-question: How do these things work?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo is made with a patented technology that is being developed for use in high-tech applications like antennas, signal transmission, bio-identification, and energy storage. The effectiveness of Kailo on the human body was sort of a happy accident. Kailo boosts the natural signals of the body and helps the brain communicate with disrupted areas more effectively. Learn more at ncaplicensing.com

settings.faq-question: Do you plug them in? Is there a battery?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo does not have a battery and it doesn’t plug in. Kailo’s billions of tiny capacitors react to the electrical charges in your body, enhancing and propagating your body’s natural communication signals.

settings.faq-question: Do the Pain Patches ever "wear out?"
settings.faq-answer: Kailo is very durable. Treated properly, Kailo may last for years before needing replacement. Kailo is a great value. No other pain relief on the market offers so much potential for a one-time purchase.

settings.faq-question: How long can I wear Kailo?
settings.faq-answer: You can wear Kailo all day every day if desired.

settings.faq-question: Can my Kailo get wet?
settings.faq-answer: Yes. Each Kailo is formed on a waterproof polyester substrate and is covered with a dielectric coating. They have been tested for water-resistance and full submersion. After use in water, simply dab it with a clean, dry towel and allow it to air dry.

settings.faq-question: Are the people in your testimonials real customers?
settings.faq-answer: 100% Absolutely. In addition, the few testimonials you read on the site are only scratching the surface. We have thousands of cases of people using our technology to improve their lives. Our team uses them every day as a matter of practicality. Kailo is a genuinely game-changing technology. Order yours today.

settings.faq-question: Will Kailo help my specific condition?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo has proven to be very universally capable. Please contact us at support@gokailo.com to learn what experiences we have had with specific conditions.

settings.faq-question: Is there a way that I can try a Kailo before I buy it?
settings.faq-answer: If you live in Utah near our offices, we welcome "drop in visits" any time between 9am and 5 pm. Otherwise, we offer you the confidence of a money-back guarantee. Give Kailo a try, contact us for help with placement if you need it, and return it if you find that it doesn’t work for you.

settings.faq-question: What if Kailo doesn’t work for me?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo is far more than just a business for us, it's changed thousands of lives already. We offer a no-hassle, 100% money-back guarantee. If you feel Kailo isn't working for you within 30 days,​ we'll gladly take it back. Before returning your Kailo, we would love a chance to make sure you've found the correct placement. Over 90% of our customers have found an increase in comfort. Our goal is to help everyone get relief. Please contact us at support@gokailo.com

settings.faq-question: Does the bumpy or smooth side of the Kailo go toward the skin?
settings.faq-answer: Either side will work the same. However, if you are using the Kailo adhesives, we find that the Kailo adhesives stick better to the smooth side of the Kailo.

settings.faq-question: Where are you guys located?
settings.faq-answer: We're based in the heart of Silicon Slopes, Utah. Kailo is designed, engineered, and manufactured in Utah — the birthplace of television, artificial heart, electric traffic lights, and Frisbee. We're proud to be part of the innovative, hard-working, and kind culture of the Beehive State.

settings.faq-question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.faq-answer: Yes! We love sharing Kailo with the world. We have shipped to 103 countries.

settings.faq-question: What is the best way to contact Kailo?
settings.faq-answer: Please email us at support@gokailo.com for the quickest response. If you are contacting us about an order, please include your name as it appears on your order.

settings.faq-question: How do I return a Kailo?
settings.faq-answer: Please contact us at support@gokailo.com so that we can help you with your return.

settings.faq-question: Why does tracking show that my international order has been in the same place for several days?
settings.faq-answer: Packages sent outside the United States have to clear customs in the destination country. This process could take days or weeks. Tracking will show the last U.S. city where your order was scanned before leaving the country. After that, tracking will not update until the package has cleared customs. Customs fees and duties may be required in order to obtain your order. If you believe that your order has cleared customs and has not yet been delivered, please check with your local post office to see if the package is being held there. Customs and duties are the responsibility of the buyer. We have no control over how long it takes for international orders to arrive. Please note that many international orders will be routed through a country other than that of its final destination. This is normal and is done to ensure a more secure delivery internationally.

settings.faq-question: How do I clean my Kailo?
settings.faq-answer: You can use warm water and soap. If there is adhesive residue from medical tape you can use Goo gone, but wash it gently afterwards. Do not use caustic or cleaners or rubbing alcohol as they can deteriorate Kailo over time.

settings.faq-question: Can you wear more than one Kailo at a time?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo works hyper locally so it can only focus on one area of pain at a time.  You can however wear more than one Kailo at a time. There is some evidence that more than two at a time minimizes the effectiveness.

settings.faq-question: Can you wear Kailo if you are pregnant?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo is an innovative, non-transdermal technology that looks and acts like a pain patch. Kailo boosts the natural signals of the body and helps the brain communicate with disrupted areas more effectively. Learn more at ncaplicensing.com. If you are using while being pregnant we suggest consulting with your doctor before use.

settings.faq-question: Does Kailo Pain Patch help relieve menstrual cramps?
settings.faq-answer: Most women experience menstrual cramps at some time during their life — and for many, the pain is excruciating. Painful periods can disrupt life and force you to miss work, lose sleep, and say no to opportunities to enjoy friends, family, and activities. Kailo has been known to help. Learn more here.

settings.faq-question: Can the Kailo Pain Patch help with back pain?
settings.faq-answer: The short answer is YES! You can finally experience the back pain relief you've been searching for. The Kailo pain patch works with your body's natural electrical system to turn down your pain receptors so you can feel good again and smile at life. You won't believe the back pain relief you can find with Kailo pain patches — until you experience the pain relief yourself. Kailo is the best pain reliever for back pain. Learn more here.

settings.faq-question: Can the Kailo Pain Patch help with knee pain?
settings.faq-answer: The answer, of course, is in Kailo's tech that was originally developed for military communications then pivoted into a smart patch that is designed to reduce pain in seconds. Learn more here.

settings.faq-question: Can you wear Kailo Pain Patch if you have a pacemaker?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo is an innovative, non-transdermal technology that looks and acts like a pain patch. Kailo boosts the natural signals of the body and helps the brain communicate with disrupted areas more effectively. Learn more at ncaplicensing.com. If you are using with a pacemaker we suggest discussing with your doctor how Kailo works and consulting with them to determine proper use.

settings.faq-question: Do you have an affiliate program?
settings.faq-answer: We do have an affiliate/influencer program. Email us at support@gokailo.com for more information.

settings.faq-question: How do I apply the adhesive?
settings.faq-answer: Place the Kailo rough side down on a flat surface.  The smooth side should be up. Then place the adhesive down on the smooth side of the Kailo with the letter side touching the Kailo.  The blank side of the adhesive should be up. Make sure the two pieces are directly on top of each other. Lift half of the adhesive and pull off the paper starting in the middle, as you are doing this flatten the adhesive side down onto the smooth side of the Kailo patch.  Repeat this step with the other half of the paper. Now your adhesive should be attached to your Kailo. Left on top is the clear plastic cover. You may want to keep this part so you have something to cover the adhesive with when it's not in use. That is the side you will attach to the spot on your body that you found relief. Also see a video of how to apply the adhesive at gokailo.com/learn

settings.faq-question: How do I remove the adhesive?
settings.faq-answer: Please refer to the video on gokailo.com/learn page. Peel up one corner of the adhesive from your Kailo patch. Then pull the adhesive away from the Kailo at a low angle almost parallel to the Kailo. (Note: you are not pulling the adhesive over the top of the Kailo, but rather away from the Kailo) The adhesive will stretch, but it will also begin peeling off and will come off clean and leave no residue.

settings.faq-question: Which side of the Kailo do I put against my skin?
settings.faq-answer: You can place either side against your skin. The differences in the textures on the Kailo is a product of the manufacturing, not a product of function. We generally like to put the adhesive on the smooth side. So, the smooth side ends up against the skin most of the time.

settings.faq-question: Will there be customs and duties on my international order?
settings.faq-answer:
Yes and customs and duties are the responsibility of the buyer. We have no control over them as they are determined by the individual governments.

If I return my Kailo for a refund, will my customs and duties be refunded to me? Not by Kailo. Those fees are collected by your government. We have googled some countries’ policies and there are some countries from which you can get a refund. That will be your responsibility as a buyer.

settings.faq-question: When can I expect my domestic order?
settings.faq-answer:
USPS First Class package: 3-5 business days

USPS Parcel Select Ground: 3-8 business days

USPS Priority Mail: 3 business days

USPS Priority Mail Express: 3 business days

*business days are Monday through Friday. USPS does not consider Saturday a business day, though they do deliver on Saturdays. Kailo only ships Monday thru Friday.

settings.faq-question: Does Kailo Pain Patch contain metal? Can the metal be absorbed into my body?
settings.faq-answer: Kailo does contain 2 conductive metals. However, studies have shown that the metal cannot and will not be absorbed by your body.

settings.info-description: Kailo has hundreds of applications. Patients say it quickly turns off pain in the head, neck, shoulder, back, knee, hand, foot, and more!
Correctly place Kailo wherever you feel pain and watch it disappear almost immediately.
Unlike drugs, the Kailo patch is non-transdermal (which means no chemicals or medicine enters your body) and is made with 100% natural occurring elements.

settings.info-heading: PATCHES LAST FOR YEARS (INCLUDE REUSABLE ADHESIVES)
settings.info-description: Worn over and over, day after day, without losing functionality. Just replace the adhesive after 3-7 days of continued use and you’re good to go. No other pain relief product offers so much value for a one-time purchase.
The strength of our body’s electrical field allows Kailo to target the pain when its placed on your skin.
Extremely durable and designed to handle any physical activity or weather condition. Wear Kailo in the shower, in the pool, during a workout, running errands & more.
If for any reason you’re not 100% satisfied with your Kailo patch, you can easily return it, hassle-free!

settings.banner-heading:
The Microtechnology Patch
That's designed to "Turn Off" Pain In Seconds
The Bizarre Pain Patch  that’s Miraculously Effective
settings.banner-text:
Some of the world’s most consequential discoveries were never intended to do what they do. The Slinkee, Play-Doh, Wite-Out...each was invented with a different purpose in mind before a happy accident changed everything. The same can be said of the Kailo Patch -- the medicine-free pain patch that’s turning skeptics into believers right and left.

Behind the instantaneous pain relief is a technology first developed for antenna signals. Yes, antennas. The patch essentially interrupts the electrical pain signals sent by your brain, dramatically reducing or even eliminating chronic pain.

settings.banner-heading:
The Microtechnology Patch
That's designed to "Turn Off" Pain In Seconds
